autoop.core.database module

class autoop.core.database.Database(storage: Storage)[source]

Bases: object

A database for storing and managing data collections.

delete(collection: str, id: str) → None[source]

Delete a key from the database :param collection: The collection to delete the data from :type collection: str :param id: The id of the data :type id: str

Returns:

None

get(collection: str, id: str) → dict | None[source]

Get a key from the database :param collection: The collection to get the data from :type collection: str :param id: The id of the data :type id: str

Returns:

The data that was stored, or None if

it doesn’t exist

Return type:

Union[dict, None]

list(collection: str) → List[Tuple[str, dict]][source]

Lists all data in a collection :param collection: The collection to list the data from :type collection: str

Returns:

A list of tuples containing the id and

data for each item in the collection

Return type:

List[Tuple[str, dict]]

refresh() → None[source]

Refresh the database by loading the data from storage

set(collection: str, id: str, entry: dict) → dict[source]

Set a key in the database :param collection: The collection to store the data in :type collection: str :param id: The id of the data :type id: str :param entry: The data to store :type entry: dict

Returns:

The data that was stored

Return type:

dict

autoop.core.storage module

class autoop.core.storage.LocalStorage(base_path: str = './assets')[source]

Bases: Storage

Implementation of a Local Storage that manages files.

delete(key: str = '/') → None[source]

Delete a local file or directory.

Parameters:

key (str) – The key is where the data is deleted from.

list(prefix: str) → List[str][source]

List all files under a specified directory path.

Parameters:

prefix (str) – The files are listed under the key.

Returns:

A list of file paths under the specified prefix.

Return type:

List[str]

load(key: str) → bytes[source]

Loads data from a local file.

Parameters:

key (str) – The key is where the data is saved.

Returns:

The data read from the file.

Return type:

bytes

save(data: bytes, key: str) → None[source]

Save data to a local file.

Parameters:

  • data (bytes) – The data to be saved.

  • key (str) – The key is where the data is saved.

exception autoop.core.storage.NotFoundError(path: str)[source]

Bases: Exception

Raises an error when the specific path is not found
